targets.rawSql: SELECT Month, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_monthly GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_monthly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ISO_Week, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_weekly GROUP BY ISO_Week ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_weekly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Day, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_daily GROUP BY Day ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_efficiency_daily GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_failures_weekly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Day, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_failures_daily GROUP BY Day ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_machine_failures_daily GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Month, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_monthly GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_monthly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ISO_Week, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_weekly GROUP BY ISO_Week ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_weekly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Day, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_daily GROUP BY Day ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Machine_ID, SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_unit_production_daily GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Total_Power_kW DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT Machine_ID,SUM(Total_Power_kW) from mv_power_consumption_monthly GROUP BY Machine_ID ORDER BY Month DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Day,SUM(Total_Power_kW) FROM mv_power_consumption_total_daily GROUP BY Day ORDER BY Day desc LIMIT 10;
SELECT ISO_Week, SUM(Total_Power_kW) from mv_total_power_consumption_weekly GROUP BY ISO_Week ORDER BY ISO_Week DESC;
